Subject: End Point Device Detection Troubles
Description:
We're having trouble with a few endpoints not being detected or listed under the Computers section in Endpoint Protector. We've tried reinstalling the client on several of these machines, but they're still not appearing.

Could we get some assistance with this? I'm based in the PT time zone, and Iosif has been our main support contact.
What_We_Know__c:
08.05
We asked for a remote session

13.05
The issue appears to be resolved following a clean install of the latest EPP client version (6.2.4.2)
Next_Steps__c:
13.05
We will follow up on this at the end of the week to get a confirmation from the customer that all the computers are now communicating with the EPP server.
Solution_Comment__c: The connection issue has been resolved with a clean install of the latest EPP agent 6.2.4.2.
